--------------------
Text: Vefa is a quarter in Istanbul, Turkey.
Triplets:<Vefa
1:
--------------------
Text: Vefa:  It is part of the district of Fatih and managed as borough of Mollahüsrev, inside the walled city.
Triplets:<Vefa
2:
--------------------
<Text: Vefa:  It belonged to the district of Eminönü between 1928 and 2008.>
Triplets:<Vefa
4:
--------------------
Text: Vefa:  It is a picturesque quarter, home of the Vefa SK, one of the historic soccer clubs of Istanbul, and of the oldest Boza shop of the city still active.
Triplets:<Vefa
